item.title: 01 Jan 2021 23:54
item.description:
After a muted attempt last year, we were able to ring in 2021 with an early morning Surfing class at Covelong. The girls loved it and I couldn’t have asked for a better start. Exhilarating, to say the least. And oh, Salt water does BURN your eyes! https://t.co/gTG7K5x2RF

Link to Tweet
item.content:encoded:
After a muted attempt last year, we were able to ring in 2021 with an early morning Surfing class at Covelong. The girls loved it and I couldn’t have asked for a better start. Exhilarating, to say the least. And oh, Salt water does BURN your eyes! https://t.co/gTG7K5x2RF
